name: Mila
description:
Mila is a romantic story, and an unconventional otome game.

Expected playing time: 10-20mins.

For this visual novel, I aim to do a practice.

In many otome games or literature, male characters usually have a darker past. And they are usually “saved” by the female character(who are players), so I made this short game, in which I emphasize to describe the female character. I want to see how I feel when I finish this game.

This game is designed for the final @Web art as site.
